paragraphs: Worth the money. Tastes so good. Easy to make. So tasty and yummy. Spice-levels are good.
Impulse buy was a win! Not a gimmick. Insanely tasty and easy Indian marinades. Kaalimirch is fire! Just go for it!
Mind blown! Tried it on everything (paneer, bhindi, etc.). GF thought I cooked a fancy dinner. Must reorder!
The flavor is restaurant-grade, trust me! Air-fry chicken thighs for 180/20min for a perfect and delicious result.
Loved the KILRR variety pack! Rich, perfectly balanced flavors. Makes marination super easy and tasty.
I absolutely loved this chicken masala! The aroma is rich and instantly reminds you of traditional Indian kitchens.

sectionMappings.name: SLAY THE MESS, SAVOR THE TASTE
sectionMappings.heading: SLAY THE MESS, SAVOR THE TASTE

paragraphs: The perfect mix of spices, herbs, dried vegetables  everything you need for your marinade or your gravy.
1. Add water & oil to spice mix
You can store the masala packs for 6 months. But we think, you won't be able to resist the temptation to use them for so long.
Tikkas Masalas marinate 250g chicken & the Gravy Masalas make 500g chicken.
It's simple Maths. If 250g needs 1 pack + 3 tbsp water; 500g needs 2X, that's 2 packs + 6 tbsp water.
Seriously!? Do you even know what's in it & for how long it's been lying in your vendor's fridge? Didn't think you would ask!
Almost all require you to add the wet ingredients  onion, ginger, garlic, chilli, curd.. why pay to waste time?
buttons: What if I need to make more?

paragraphs: We crave good clean food, but we are also lazy like you all. And, that's why we made these instant marinades.
